def has_switch(light:item):
    # Determine whether this light has a switch
    symbol has_switch=exists switch:item: is_light(switch) and has_switch(switch)
    return has_switch

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bedroom: item where:
            is_bedroom(bedroom)
        # Select the bedroom

        bind light: item where:
            is_light(light) and inside(light, bedroom)
        # Select the light inside the bedroom

        if has_switch(light):
            achieve is_on(light)
            # Turn on the light in the bedroom
